headline: Warren Buffett's Advice: 'If You Aren't Willing To Own A Stock For Ten Years, Don't Even Think About Owning It For Ten Minutes'
summary: Billionaire investor Warren Buffett is known for his emphasis on long-term investments. He focuses on businesses that he believes will maintain a competitive edge for decades to come. What Happened: Buffett’s “buy and hold” strategy is the key to his advice for Apple investors to not get caught up in short-term metrics. “Nobody buys a farm based on whether they think it’s going to rain next year. They buy it because they think it’s a good investment over 10 or 20 years,” he said in an interview

headline: 1 Magnificent S&P 500 Dividend Stock Down 4% to Buy and Hold Forever
summary: Patient investors can collect dividends while waiting for the stock price to recover.
